description: Submission of details of Construction Logistics Plan pursuant to condition 10; two safe and secure cycle parking spaces pursuant to condition 11; provision of the adequate storage of refuse and recyclables pursuant to condition 12; sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from dwellings pursuant to condition 16; Ventilation Strategy Report pursuant to condition 17; Ultra-Low NOx Gas fired boilers pursuant to condition 18; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 19; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 20; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 21; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 22; verification report pursuant to condition 23; onward long-term monitoring methodology report pursuant to condition 24 of planning permission ref: 2019/00681/FUL granted 20th June 2019.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
